Package org.drip.simm20.credit

Credit Qualifying/Non-Qualifying Risk Factor Settings

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CRBucket
    CRBucket holds the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Credit Quality, Sector List, and Risk Weights for a given Credit Qualifying/Non-Qualifying Issuer Exposure Bucket.
    CRNQBucketCorrelation
    CRNQBucketCorrelation contains the between the Same/Different Issuer/Seniority and Different Vertex/Currency for the Same Credit Non-Qualifying Buckets.
    CRNQSettingsContainer
    CRNQSettingsContainer holds the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Credit Non-Qualifying Buckets.
    CRNQSystemics
    CRNQSystemics contains the Systemic Settings of the Credit Non-Qualifying Risk Factors.
    CRQBucketCorrelation
    CRQBucketCorrelation contains the between the Same/Different Issuer/Seniority and Different Vertex/Currency for the Same Credit Qualifying Buckets.
    CRQSettingsContainer
    CRQSettingsContainer holds the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Credit Qualifying Buckets.
    CRQSystemics
    CRQSystemics contains the Systemic Settings of the Credit Qualifying Risk Factors.
    CRSystemics
    CRSystemics contains the Systemic Settings Common to both Qualifying and Non-Qualifying Credit Risk Factors.
    CRThresholdContainer
    CRThresholdContainer holds the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Credit Risk Thresholds - the Credit Risk Buckets and the Delta/Vega Limits defined for the Concentration Thresholds.
    SectorSystemics
    SectorSystemics contains the Systemic Settings that hold Sector-related Information.

Package org.drip.simm20.credit Description

Credit Qualifying/Non-Qualifying Risk Factor Settings
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
